title: Total distance traveled from velocity equation

content.prompt: The velocity v in meters per second of an object moving in a straight line is given as a function of time t in seconds by v = 4t3 + 2t. The total distance the object travels between t = 1 s and t = 2 s is

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
